channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 08:28 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 游리 08:28 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 08:01 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 08:01 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated.
